name: Nikon D3500 W/ AF-P DX NIKKOR 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6G VR Black
short_description: A DSLR that's as easy to use as a point and shoot camera
Compact, comfortable design that's great for travel and special events
Image sensor that's 15x larger than those used in typical smartphones for sharper, clearer pictures
Works with Nikon’s snap bridge app for sharing photos with a compatible smartphone or tablet
1080p full hd videos with monaural sound at the touch of a button. Bluetooth version 4.1
product_description: Beautiful pictures for all. You don't need to be a photographer to know a great photo when you see one. And you don't need to be a photographer to take a great photo-you just need the D3500. It's as easy to use as a point-and-shoot, but it takes beautiful DSLR photos and videos that get noticed. It feels outstanding in your hands, sturdy and balanced with controls where you want them. It's compact, durable and versatile, ideal for travel. And it works seamlessly with compatible smartphones, making it easier than ever to share your great photos. Even if you've never picked up a DSLR camera, you can take beautiful pictures with D3500.

name: Yatao Digital Cameras for Photography and Vlogging, 6K 64MP Flip Screen, Dual Lens, Microphone for Video, 64GB TF Card, Compact Photo WiFi Camera for YouTube Kit Travel, Beginners (Black)

【Travel-Friendly Camera with Flip Screen】 This portable digital camera is your perfect travel companion, featuring a 180° flip screen for selfies and creative shots.
【WiFi Connectivity and App Control】 It allow instant sharing on social platforms like Instagram and TikTok, making it user-friendly for all photographers.

【Affordable & Abundant Package for Gift-Giving】This cheap digital camera offers a 64GB memory card, lens hood, high-fidelity microphone, camera strap, and two rechargeable batteries for extended shooting sessions. Whether for birthdays, holidays, or special occasions, this compact digital camera is the perfect gift to inspire creativity and capture memories.

product_description: This pre-owned or refurbished product has been professionally inspected and tested to work and look like new. How a product becomes part of Amazon Renewed, your destination for pre-owned, refurbished products: A customer buys a new product and returns it or trades it in for a newer or different model. That product is inspected and tested to work and look like new by Amazon-qualified suppliers. Then, the product is sold as an Amazon Renewed product on Amazon. If not satisfied with the purchase, renewed products are eligible for replacement or refund under the Amazon Renewed Guarantee.

name: Camcorder Video Cameras, 5K 56MP Vlogging Camera with Night Vision, WiFi, 3” 270° Rotatable Touchscreen Vlog Camera Youtube with 64GB SD Card, Microphone, Stabilizer, Remote, Batteries, Tripod
short_description: UHD 5K & 56MP Video Camera: The camcorder video camera has a good performance in recording with UHD 5K & 25FPS video resolution and high quality 56MP still images. The 3-inch IPS touch screen and 270 degrees rotatable youtube camera allow you to capture and watch with precision. The camcorder 5K supports 16X digital zoom, you can press the “W” or “T” button to zoom in and out to easily capture distant landscapes (Note: The camera lens is fixed-focus lens, does not support autofocus and manual focus function, and the best shooting distance is 0.6 meters or more)

2 Batteries & Remote Control : The 5K camera video is equipped with two high-capacity batteries (2400mAh), which can record up to 120-150 minutes of 5K video on a single fully charged battery; and supports recording while charging (only powered by 5V/2A charger, not directly connected to computer. The movie camera is equipped with IR remote control, you must open the camcorder, face the remote receiver window, and be within 8 meters

IR Night Vision & Microphone : The camcorder supports infrared night vision and fill light shooting, which can be used for night shooting; Short-press the “Power” button to enable or disable the infrared night vision mode. You can take clear black and white photos and videos even in a dark environment. The youtube camera 5K comes with len hood to block excess light and protect your podcast camera lens from accidental damage. Foldable handheld Stabilizer holder keeps the video recorder stable when recording.The video camera with microphone can filters out external noise for superior sound quality

WiFi Function & Webcam Function & HDMI : The video camera recorder supports WiFi (APP)Control. You can instantly download, transfer, and share photos and videos via your mobile device to your friends and family. The video camera camcorders 5K supports for video chatting and live streaming when used as webcam. Just connect with PC via USB cable, choose 'PC Camera' mode to enter webcam function. This vlogging camera can be connected to TV by HDMI cable

Multifunctional Camcorders Video Camera 5K: The video camera for vlogging supports anti-shake, WDR, playback, continuous shooting, time-lapse, slow motion, loop recording, etc. This is a great choice for YouTube and Vlogging. If you have any questions or concerns with camera for video recording, please choose to contact to us, our friendly customer service will do our best to solve your problem within 12 hours
